channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump’s onetime friendship with Jeffrey Epstein is well-known — and also documented in records
item.description: The revelation that Attorney General Pam Bondi told President Donald Trump that his name was in the Jeffrey Epstein files has focused fresh attention on the president’s relationship with the wealthy financier.

item.title: A man is stopped climbing the US-Mexico border wall. Under new Trump rules, US troops sound the alarm
Florida Gov. DeSantis says deportation flights from ‘Alligator Alcatraz’ have begun
